-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((CHOICE ∧ c0 ∈ LVec)→ c1 ≠ ∅)
⊣ c1 =(LBasis ` c0)
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0,(Base ` c0))
⊣ d(hs0, ∅)
⊣ d(hs0,(LSpan ` c0))
⊣ d(hs0, c1)

comment: Every vector space has a basis. This theorem is an AC equivalent; this is the forward implication. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-May-2015.)
